biotools.summary:
High-performance library for (non-)uniform sampling of convex-constrained models.

The Highly Optimized Polytope Sampling toolbox is an open-source C++17 library for efficient and scalable MCMC algorithms for sampling convex-constrained spaces possibly equipped with arbitrary target functions.

bioschemas.name: HOPS_tk
bioschemas.summary:
High-performance library for (non-)uniform sampling of convex-constrained models.

The Highly Optimized Polytope Sampling toolbox is an open-source C++17 library for efficient and scalable MCMC algorithms for sampling convex-constrained spaces possibly equipped with arbitrary target functions.
